detailed_results.details: Root endpoint accessible: ETF Intelligence System API - Enhanced Version
Complete authentication system working: login, JWT tokens, user info, password updates, forgot password
All endpoints working: preview with snapshot+signal+params_version, publish returns id/version, revert activates previous version
SendGrid settings working: GET returns configured flag (False), POST with dummy key returns instruction message and doesn't persist key
System responsive - scheduler functionality not breaking core API
Root endpoint accessible: ETF Intelligence System API - Enhanced Version
